subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: James Blake ended the three-year Queen's Club reign of Andy Roddick yesterday in London, announcing himself as a surprise contender for Wimbledon. Blake beat Roddick, 7-5, 6-4, to reach his first grass-court final, where he will face Lleyton Hewitt. Hewitt beat Tim Henman, 6-3, 3-6, 6-2.
snippet: James Blake ended the three-year Queen's Club reign of Andy Roddick yesterday in London, announcing himself as a surprise contender for Wimbledon. Blake beat Roddick, 7-5, 6-4, to reach his first grass-court final, where he will face Lleyton Hewitt....
